bugModalDesc: Send this to me in case an unexpectable behavior happens.

onboard.greetings: Basset is a free open source utility, its goals are:

goals.simplicity: Simplicity and ease [Basset means simple in Arabic :)] âœ¨

onboard.features: Basset lets you remove music, cut/trim, convert, compress, downgrade quality of your Audio/Video file. moreover you can convert Audio files to Video files using a still Image you choose.
onboard.steps: steps: choose your Video/Audio file --> choose your wanted operation.

uploadPage.downloadFromInternetPlaceholder: Youtube, X, Instagram, Soundcloud, Facebook, Linkedin link
uploadPage.geoRestricted: This content is not available in your region due to geographic restrictions
uploadPage.loginRequired: Authentication required - please sign in to access this content
uploadPage.rateLimit: Rate limit exceeded - please wait before trying again
uploadPage.drmProtected: This content is protected by DRM and cannot be downloaded
uploadPage.noFormats: No downloadable video formats found for this content
uploadPage.privateVideo: This video is private or has been removed
uploadPage.networkError: Network connection error - please check your internet connection

operations.compressTip: 32% is the sweet spot (less file size + very little change in quality)
operations.uploadImageDescription: The image will be still throughout the video

formatSelect.label: Output format
formatSelect.explanation: Formats determine how videos/audios are saved. Each format has its own distinguishing features in terms of quality, file size, or compatibility with applications; anyways, I recommend using MP4, MP3 and PNG unless you have a different purpose.

qualitySelect.explanation: Compression reduces the file size without degrading the quality. Quality, on the other hand, reduces both and quality.

removeMusic.notice1: This operation uses AI, and can make mistakes in recognizing music.
removeMusic.notice2: You can remove noise and background sounds using this operation too.
removeMusic.notice3: This operation is unlimited and compatible with all audio and video lengths.

executeBtn.selectImageErr: Please choose an Image before converting to Video
executeBtn.inputFileErrDesc: Either it's deleted or corrupted. check file's validity.
executeBtn.outputFileErrTitle: Something went wrong while saving file
executeBtn.outputFileErrDesc: Either there's no space left on device or no permissions to write to storage
executeBtn.invalidFormatErrTitle: This format isn't supported or invalid

updater.updaterMessage: Update Basset to have the latest changes like performance improvements, bug fixes, and much more. Update will download in background.
